bubble.title: Bubble Sort
bubble.description1: Bubble sort is like lining up bubbles of different sizes.
bubble.description2: The biggest bubble rises to the top, while smaller ones sink. Repeat until they're all in order. It's slow, but it gets the job done!

insertion.title: Insertion Sort
insertion.description1: Insertion sort is like sorting a deck of cards.
insertion.description2: You pick up each card one by one and insert it into its correct position among the sorted cards. It's efficient for small datasets and is similar to how people arrange cards in their hands!

merge.title: Merge Sort
merge.description1: Imagine a group of number friends.
merge.description2: They like to divide and conquer: half goes left, half goes right. Then, they pair up and dance their way back in sorted order. It's like a sorting dance-off with a twist!

instructions.title: Instructions
instructions.description1: 1) Start by selecting atleast one algorithm
instructions.description2: 2) Adjust the the data value and Press START
